name: Til Death Do Us Apart
description:
We were happy. We were all very happy, until that damn bunny came to my house when I was gone and stole all of my friends with him. 

I don't know why he took them. I don't know what's he gonna do with them. But what I do know is that he's gonna pay for what he did, and I am taking my friends back.

I am nothing without my buddies.  We are only stronger together apart I am...nothing. They are a part of my soul.

There are going to be many challenges, but I must complete all of them.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The person here- ahh well this is my first game so idk tell me how you like it. Also well...sorry… I Don’t know how to do GUI’s yet that nicely, so I couldn’t exactly add a start screen or something really fancy.

I mean those pictures you see in this page were actually made for the start screen and ded screen. But well...what can I say maybe I’ll add them later.

Also, just in case if you’re thinking that I just made a random game and just submitted in the game jam without any relation to it well then you’re wrong this game was actually made specifically for this game jam….

I mean I had the idea for something like ditto, but then I realized that it was literally what everybody else thought, and then I just tried to come up with something different and well here you go we are only stronger with our friends…

If I actually knew how to do GUI I might’ve done better and even something better for the end screen thing.

But what can I say I mean I started learning this literally just a week before this jam and then I was like oh yeah lt’s to join it without even thinking that I don’t know game developing yet.

Also...yeah I seriously don’t know what I was supposed to write here cause this is looking like a dev blog like thing so yeah forgive me if I was supposed to write something else. I’m doing this for the first time.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
